description: The D-Link EXO AX4800 (DIR-X4860) router is vulnerable to remote unauthenticated command execution that could lead to complete device takeovers by attackers with access to the HNAP port. [...]
title: PoC exploit released for RCE zero-day in D-Link EXO AX4800 routers

description: Today, ​Microsoft fixed a known issue breaking VPN connections across client and server platforms after installing the April 2024 Windows security updates. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes VPN failures caused by April Windows updates

description: The Singing River Health System is warning that it is now estimating that 895,204 people are impacted by a ransomware attack it suffered in August 2023. [...]
title: Singing River Health System: Data of 895,000 stolen in ransomware attack

description: VMWare has made Workstation Pro and Fusion Pro free for personal use, allowing home users and students to set up their own virtualized test labs and play with another operating system at little to no cost. [...]
title: VMware makes Workstation Pro and Fusion Pro free for personal use

description: Microsoft has fixed a known issue causing NTLM authentication failures and domain controller reboots after installing last month's Windows Server security updates. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes Windows Server bug causing crashes, NTLM auth failures

description: ​Microsoft has fixed a zero-day vulnerability exploited in attacks to deliver QakBot and other malware payloads on vulnerable Windows systems. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes Windows zero-day exploited in QakBot malware attacks

description: Microsoft has released the KB5037768 cumulative update for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 10 22H2 with twenty changes, including account notifications in the Start Menu and Widgets on the lock screen. [...]
title: Windows 10 KB5037768 update released with new features and 20 fixes

description: Today is Microsoft's May 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 61 flaws and three actively exploited or publicly disclosed zero days. [...]
title: Microsoft May 2024 Patch Tuesday fixes 3 zero-days, 61 flaws

description: Microsoft is rolling out the KB5037771 cumulative update for Windows 11 23H3 with thirty bug fixes and changes, including a fix for a bug breaking VPN connections. [...]
title: Windows 11 KB5037771 update released with 30 fixes, changes

description: A malware botnet known as 'Ebury' has infected almost 400,000 Linux servers since 2009, with roughly 100,000 still compromised as of late 2023. [...]
title: Ebury botnet malware infected 400,000 Linux servers since 2009

description: On Monday, Apple and Google jointly announced a new privacy feature that warns Android and iOS users when an unknown Bluetooth tracking device travels with them. [...]
title: Apple and Google add alerts for unknown Bluetooth trackers to iOS, Android

description: VMware fixed four security vulnerabilities in the Workstation and Fusion desktop hypervisors, including three zero-days exploited during the Pwn2Own Vancouver 2024 hacking contest. [...]
title: VMware fixes three zero-day bugs exploited at Pwn2Own 2024

description: Google has released emergency security updates for the Chrome browser to address a high-severity zero-day vulnerability tagged as exploited in attacks. [...]
title: Google Chrome emergency update fixes 6th zero-day exploited in 2024
